translations: v．记住，熟记：把某事物牢记在心，以便随时回忆。
· She memorizes all the important dates in history.
她记住了历史上所有重要的日期。

sentences.sentence: The contestant, who correctly memorizes all 52 cards in the quickest time, wins the event.
sentences.translation: 在最短时间内记住这52张牌并且都准确无误的参赛者将是本次活动的胜利者。

sentences.sentence: Words of the lyrics (episodes) narrates a soul and memorizes on paper the same way and brings to your table.
sentences.translation: 每一段音乐都是用心的美感之作，每一段美好的回忆就这样让手中的文字带给你…

sentences.sentence: Do not allow other thoughts to enter your mind because this well lower your chances of making accurate memorizes.
sentences.translation: 不要让其他的想法进入你的脑海中，因为这个广为降低你的机会，作出正确的存储。
